channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- QueryWall: Plug'n Play Firewall
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- QueryWall: Plug'n Play Firewall

item.title: CVE-2023-2492|2024-08-02T06:26:08.569Z -- unknown -- querywall%3A%20plug%27n%20play%20firewall
item.description: The QueryWall: Plug'n Play Firewall WordPress plugin through 1.1.1 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by high privilege users such as admin.
